channel.title: got ya on Gonzalo's thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in got ya on Gonzalo's thoughts

item.title: Improving Windows build times in EKS
item.description: Improving Windows build times in EKS I cannot believe a year has passed since my last annotation (which was also EKS and Windows related). One of our most recent projects has been moving most of our build infrastructure to the cloud.

item.title: Windows 2022 in EKS with packer
item.description: Windows 2022 in EKS Update: This article is no longer relevant. AWS already has Windows 2022 optimized images If you are using Windows in EKS, you are probably eagerly awaiting for an Windows 2022 AMI.

item.title: Debugging windows nodes in EKS
item.description: Debugging windows nodes in EKS After a couple of days dealing with windows nodes in Kubernetes AWS EKS, I thought I would provide a quick write-up of what I’ve seen. For two reasons
